grapa.gui.GUIMainElements

Defines the different elements of the GUI.

@author: Romain Carron Copyright (c) 2025, Empa, Laboratory for Thin Films and Photovoltaics, Romain Carron

Classes

GUIFrameActionsCurves(master, application, ...)

Handles part with actions specific to curves Contains a Frame, to be embedded in a wider application (.frame.pack()) Some methods will call methods of application
